name: Pinpoint
description:
Stranded deep in enemy territory after a successful infiltration of one of the evil Colonial Empire's bases, you find yourself surrounded on all sides by enemy starfighters.

Your mission is simple:

Endure, and Survive against all odds...

Available for Mac OS X, Windows, and Linux.

Notes:

  • Created as my final game project for my Winter Quarter "Playgramming" course at DePaul University with Processing.
  • Uses a modified version of Louie Mantia's Briar Rose wallpaper for all background images.
